attributes.action: Curtail lenders freedom to send out direct marketing material for people to increase their debt
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
People should not be encouraged to increase their debt easily by the numerous offers of finance over longer periods, suited only to bolster the coffers of the lender and potentialy leaving families with even greater debt burdens, due to the increased amount of interest that will be incurred.

Advertising for the increasment of debt needs to be curtailed so that the economy is more realistically reflected.

This is a false economy which only the greedy lenders can profit from, not the downwards-spiralling individual.
